original_text: So, as a result of his one sacrifice, Christ has made God's people completely clean for all time. So, as a result of his one sacrifice, Christ has made God's people completely clean for all time.
korean_text: 그가 거룩하게 된 자들을 한 번의 제사로 영원히 온전하게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: So, as a result of his one sacrifice
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그의 한 번의 제물로 인하여

sentences.original_text: Christ has made God's people completely clean
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도는 하나님의 백성을 완전히 깨끗하게 만들었습니다
